attributes.action: Request the US Govt to stop the collection of funds by NORAID as this is used for terrorist activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to my attention that the old front for the IRA, NorAid, is fundraising in the US again. In the light of recent events in NI this activity must be stopped. We are fighting `terrorism` alongside the US Forces so we should not have them supporting the same over here, however misguided the motives.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
